name: Config 2022: Figma Hacks and Workflow Enhancements with Plugins
description:
Figma has many great community-generated plugins that can be used to streamline your design work and design system.


What if we want more features that we prefer or that our organization needs?

This session describes several ways to hack Figma that can be done by designers who can code a little, but not by developers with advanced development skills.


日本語のスライドは2枚目のPageにあります。


YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W1uwT-CUmUA
